about_the_game:
HerSoVerse is a streaming 3d environment with Twitch integration that provides tools to interact with your viewers.



Using some preconfigured commands, your viewers can spawn, configure their appearances and move their own avatars within the 3d environment. There
are also some chat commands that add screen effects to help or disturb you when you play (e.g. turning your screen upside-down)



There are plenty spots on the house walls where you can place any picture you like, or simply to show your viewers what you're doing/playing/talking about
during the stream. You can also configure StreamLabels within the "labels" folder.



You can configure up to 3 video input devices. You can add cameras, video capture devices or virtual video devices (e.g. OBS). The common setup is the streamer camera, a video capture device (e.g. consoles) and a second cam to show whatever you want (e.g. Your keyboard and mouse, your pet cat sleeping...)



Place and configure the StreamLabels labels folder in the root of the HerSoVerse, it will automatically grab the files used, the rest of the infos are configurable in options.


Halloween

Changes in the environment.

Christmas

Changes the environment to a snowy one.

Gifts

Let your viewers look for some random gift boxes that appear through the world, but only one has a real prize.



Viewers can join some minigames.

FrutaJam

Move through the gridmap to collect fruits that spawns randomly and earn points.

Casillas

A guessing/luck minigame where you can choose a grid cell and hope it has the highest price.

Balls

Avatars become balls in this marbles-like minigame.

HerSoVerSo Battle Royale

Let your viewers push themselves to exhaustion until there is only one.

Monster Royale

Zombies and ghosts appear in the environment. [Halloween only]

SnowCatcher

Be the last one to touch the snowball. [Christmas only]

SnowTimeChatch

Keep control of the snowball longer than the rest. [Christmas only]
